h3.span: Welcome to the Westborough Public Schools

img.title: AB
img.style: border-width: 8px; border-style: solid; float: left; border-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 90px; height: 111px;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Earlier this afternoon, Governor Baker announced that all schools in Massachusetts will be closed for the remainder of the school year. Sitting here in my office I am reflecting on the news. While I had anticipated this news, it was still a shock to hear. It is very sad that all of the important and meaningful culminating experiences that constitute the final stretch of the school year will now change. I am just so sorry for our families and our students. Today that reality is difficult to accept, but tomorrow our leadership team will begin planning and adapting as needed for when we return from vacation.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; margin-bottom: 10px;

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: I want to reassure all of you that we will successfully manage this next stage of planning as quickly and thoughtfully as possible. Fortunately, we have a strong distance learning model successfully in place that faculty and families have helped to establish by working together as a community. With that same focus and approach we will create ways to meaningfully close out this year and to plan for a smooth start in the fall.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; margin-bottom: 10px;

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Over the next week the Department of Elementary and Secondary Education will be providing guidance on a range of important topics such as graduation and what we might expect next year. Also, we will provide a special focus to our graduating seniors. We will work with them to provide meaningful closure, and we will connect with them and their families to gather ideas.

span.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
